mt::CriticalSection

mt::CriticalSection< T > Class Template Reference

Scope-based critical section object This object locks when it is created and unlocks as soon as it goes out of scope. More...

Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class mt::CriticalSection< T >

Scope-based critical section object This object locks when it is created and unlocks as soon as it goes out of scope. 

  void performCSOp(Info& specialInfo)
  {
     CriticalSection cs(&globalLock); // We now have the lock
     GlobalBuffer.remove(specialInfo);
  }
